page.title: 08NW WILTSHIRE LOCAL PLAN
page.content: The recent proposals for Sherston in the next ten years outlined in the NW. Wiltshire local plan have proved to be rather{controversial.}The proposals are to build houses on land adjacent to Manor Close which had been thought of as the new school site.This would now be moved to the W.of Knock_ down Rd. on the opposite corner to Green Lane.Houses would be built upon the present allotment site between Green Lane & Manor Close. At a{public meeting}held in July 1985 some villagers expressed opposit_ ion to the extent of the housing development (50 houses) & the dangers for children in siting a future school near crossroads.Some were{apprehensive about the impact on the village of such a{large influx of people.}The Parish Council was to outline these objections to the planning authority.
